p: Treatment of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular systems is not one of the traditional uses of ZRR, but they have been identified as potential targets as part of an in-depth study of the pharmacological effects of ZRR. Moreover, with the development of modern separation and purification technology, the compounds in ZRR also have protective effects on the cardiovascular and cerebrovascular systems, such as 6-gingerol. The results showed that its mechanisms are closely related to antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects.
